changes: Added set: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic (DD3_DVD)
Added set: Duel Decks Anthology, Elves vs. Dragons (DD3_EVG)
Added set: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana (DD3_GVL)
Added set: Duel Decks Anthology, Jace vs. Chandra (DD3_JVC)
Added card backs for Collector's Edition and International Editionm see Card Backs documentation section
FRF: Update set icon to high quality

The 8BS and 9BS sets have been removed. The images have been incorporated into the 8ED and 9ED sets. This was done because the cards are technically part of Eighth/Ninth Edition and were tournament legal, despite only being available in the box set starter versions of these editions. These types of starter cards are already part of Magic 2015 and may be in future core sets as well, so it made sense to make this change
VMA: Updated card images to higher resolution and accurate magic online renderings
Added set: Fate Reforged (FRF)
Added Tombstone icon
C14: Updated set icon to high quality
pFNM, pHHO, pWPN: Added some additional promo cards
M15: Added missing token images.
M15, CNS, KTK, DDN: Updated card images to high resolution versions.
CM1: Fixed the crop images for 'Command Tower'
Added seperate zip files for crops and also different zips for HQ and non-HQ images (the default zip file now contains the non-HQ images).
C14: Fixed the crops for planeswalkers
Added multiverseid access to images from the 'Box Set' cards from 9ED/8ED (9BS/8BS)
Added set: Commander 2014 (C14)
8BS, 9BS, MGB: Added set symbols
Added set: Ninth Edition Box Set (9BS)
Added set: Eighth Edition Box Set (8BS)
Added set: Coldsnap Theme Decks (CST)
Added set: Multiverse Gift Box (MGB)
Added several new promo images.
DDM: Images are now color corrected.
Added multiverseid access to images from the Gatherer PPR set.
Added missing 'all' symbols for 'c' and 'chaos'.
MD1: Updated card images to high resolution versions.
Updated a few promo cards to higher resolution versions.
KTK: Set symbols are now high quality.
KTK: 3 cards were acidentally DDN images. They now correctly are KTK images.
Added zip files for all sets and images.
KTK, V14, M15, CNS: Updated card images to slightly higher resolution spoiler versions.
Added new promotion cards.
Added set: Khans of Tarkir (KTK)
VMA, V14: Updated set symbols to high quality versions.
pMEI: Replaced a german language card with an english one.
MD1, DDN: Updated set symbols to high quality versions.
Added a card back image.
M15, CNS: Updated set symbols to high quality versions.
Added a SetSymbols.json file that lists which rarity symbols are available for each set.
pMEI: Replaced a german language card with an english one.

Added set icons for MD1, CNS, VMA, M15, V14 and DDN. Note: These are low quality icons as high quality SVG versions do not yet exist. They will be upgraded to high quality versions when they become available.
Added set: Duel Decks: Speed vs. Cunning (DDN)
Added promo cards! Added 27 new promo sets with 4-letter set codes that begin with a lowercase 'p'.
As part of promo cards being added, the HHO and PPR sets have been removed. HHO is now pHHO and PPR's cards are spread across different promo sets.
Added set: From the Vault: Annihilation (2014) (V14)
M15: Images are now correctly JPG files instead of PNG
Added aliases 'chaos' and 'c' for the chaosdice symbol.
Duel Decks: Jace vs. Vraska (DDM) images are now high resolution
Journey into Nyx (JOU) images are now high resolution
Commander's Arsenal has the set code CM1 now instead of CMA to match the official set code.
Added set: Magic 2015 Core Set (M15)
Added set: Vintage Masters (VMA)
Added set: Magic: The Gathering—Conspiracy (CNS)
Added an 'I2P' alias for 'ITP'
Added an 'all' directory for symbols that contains all symbols of all types (set, mana and other).
UNH, PPR, PCH, HHO, DPA, DKM, ATH: The full 'special.svg' is now present (before only s.svg existed for those sets)
C13, JOU: Fixed bugs in the SVG files that prevented opening in some programs
Added set symbols, mana symbols and other symbols.
Added set: Modern Event Deck 2014 (MD1)
Added set: Journey into Nyx (JOU)
Added set: Duels of the Planeswalkers (DPA)
Born of the Gods (BNG) images are now high resolution
Added set: Rivals Quick Start Set (RQS)
Added set: Introductory Two-Player Set (ITP)
Added set: Deckmasters (DKM)
Added set: Anthologies (ATH)
Version number is now three digits in major.minor.bug format. "minor" will be updated whenever a new set is added. "bug" will be updated when small changes take place.
Added set: Duel Decks: Jace vs. Vraska (DDM)
Added set: Happy Holidays (HHO)
Added last remaining crops for Schemes, Planes, Phenomenon and tokens. Now every card has crops.
Sets can now also be accessed via their legacy gatherer 2-digit set codes

Images now have a 2 year HTTP cache expiration date (instead of 1 week). Sets that don't have high resolution images yet will only have a 1 week HTTP cache expiration so when high resolution images are available people get the new ones in less than a week if cached.
V13, C13: Images are now higher resolution
Crops have been added for ALL sets that were missing them (V13, C13, THS, UNH, UGL, MED, ME2, ME3, ME4, VAN, PPR)
Images have been compressed in order to load faster. There is very little visual difference. Uncompressed versions are still available, see: Image Compression
Fixed bugs when accessing via multiverseid (crops were missing, case was sensitive and the expires header was missing)
Added support for 'old' set codes: 9E, 8E, 7E, 6E, 5E, 4E, D2, COM, P02, NEM, PCH, FVR, FVL, FVE, CFX
Added an 'Expires' HTTP header to all images for better caching
Added set: Born of the Gods (BNG)
Theros images are now higher resolution.
“Curly quotes” are now correctly handled for cards like: Kongming, “Sleeping Dragon”
Added set: Vanguard (VAN)
Added set: Masters Edition (MED)
Added set: Masters Edition II (ME2)
Added set: Masters Edition III (ME3)
Added set: Masters Edition IV (ME4)
Added crops for most sets and cards.
Fixed the /multiverseid/ lookup for Planechase 'planes' and Archenemy 'schemes'
Added set: Promo set for Gatherer (PPR)
Underscores "_" can be used instead of spaces " " in card names
Card names, set codes and set names are now case insensitive
CCGHQ and Cockatrice naming conventions are now support
Added tokens and planes
Added multiverseid access
Removed zips, see CCGHQ for zips
First release!
